column2: "Afei aber a wowiee iyi nyinara no
column3: Israel nyinara a wohun hɔn no fiir edzi kɔr Juda nkurow no mu
column4: na wokobubuu edum no mu esinesin
column7: na afɔrmbukyia no wɔ Juda na Benjamin nyinara
column8: wɔ Efraim na Manaasɛ mu so
column9: kodur dɛ wɔsɛɛ ne nyinara. Nna Israelmba no nyinara sanee

column2: "Na Hezekia hyehyɛɛ asɔfo na Levifo nkyekyɛmu no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nkyekyɛmu tsetsee
column3: nyimpa biara dɛ mbrɛ no som tse
column4: asɔfo no na Levifo no nyina
column5: dze maa ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr
column7: na wonyi ayɛw wɔ EWURADZE ne nseraban aponkɛse no mu."

column2: "Eso ɔhyɛɛ ɔhen no ne kyɛpɛn a ofi n’ahodze mu dze maa ɔhyew afɔr no
column4: anapa na ewimbir ɔhyew afɔr no dze
column9: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ EWURADZE ne mbra nwoma no mu no."

column2: "Nkyii so ɔhyɛɛ nkorɔfo a wɔtse Jerusalɛm no dɛ wɔmfa asɔfo no na Levifo no hɔn kyɛfa no mma
column3: ma wɔdze hɔnho aama EWURADZE ne mbra no."

column2: "Na ntsɛmara a mbrasɛm no tahyee ara nna Israelmba no dze eburow
column6: na haban mu ndɔbaa nyinara mu nduadzewakan piigyan bae; na adze nyinara mu ebupɛn du du no so wɔdze baa piigyan."

column2: "Na Israel na Judamba a wɔtsetse Juda nkurow mu no
column3: hɔn so wɔdze anantwi na nguan mu ebupɛn du du
column4: na ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn a wɔayɛ no krɔnkrɔn ama hɔn EWURADZE Nyankopɔn no ebupɛn du du no bae

column2: "Bosoom a otsia ebiasa no mu na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrotow ekuwekuw no ne fapem
column3: na wowiei wɔ bosoom a otsia esuon no mu."

column2: "Na aber a Hezekia na asafohemfo no bae bohun ekuwekuw no
"Nna Hezekia bisaa asɔfo na Levifo no ekuwekuw no ho asɛm."
"Na ɔsɔfopanyin Azaria a ofi Zadok fie no
column4: Ofitsi dɛ ɔman no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔdze ayɛyɛdze reba EWURADZE ne fie no
column6: na yeegyaa pii osiandɛ EWURADZE ehyira ne man; na dza ɔkae no nye fiadze kɛse yi."

column2: "Nna Hezekia hyɛɛ dɛ wonsiesie mpia wɔ EWURADZE ne fi no mu; na wosiesiei."
"Na wɔdze ayɛyɛdze no
column4: na ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn bɛhyɛɛ mu wɔ nokwar mu ara: na Levinyi Konania na ɔyɛ ɔpanyin wɔ do
column5: na no nua Simei dzi hɔ."

column2: "Na Jehiel
column11: na Benaia nye ahwɛdofo wɔ Konania na no nua Simei nsaadze
column13: na Nyankopɔn ne fie do ɔpanyin Azaria hyehyɛe no."

column2: "Na Levinyi Imna ne ba Kore
column4: na ɔhwɛ Nyankopɔn n’ayamuyi ayɛyɛdze no do
column6: na krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn no bɛma."

column2: "Na ɔno n’ase na Eden
column10: dɛ wɔdze bɛma hɔn nuanom dɛ mbrɛ nkyekyɛmu no tsetsee no
column11: ɔkɛse dze tse dɛ ekumaba dze:"

column2: "ɔsor hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn mbarimba ananakan do a
column3: ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe ebiasa do dze rokɔ no
column4: mekyerɛ obiara a ɔhɛn EWURADZE ne fie
column5: dɛ mbrɛ da biara n’edwuma regye
column6: dɛ wɔbɔsom wɔ hɔn ahwɛdodze mu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nkyekyɛmu tsetsee no;"

column2: "na asɔfo no mu hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn ananakan do dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efiefi tsetsee
column3: na Levifo no so ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu do dze rokɔ no
column4: wɔ hɔn ahwɛdodze mu wɔ hɔn nkyekyɛmu do;"

column2: "na hɔn mbofraba
column5: na hɔn mbabaa nyinara mu hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn ananakan do
column6: wɔ mboanofo no nyinara mu: na hɔn nokwardzi edwuma no mu na wɔtseew hɔnho wɔ krɔnkrɔndze ho:"

column2: "eso Aaronmba asɔfo no a wɔwɔ hɔn nkurow no mfikyisaase do nhaban mu no
column5: dɛ wɔmfa kyɛpɛn mma asɔfo no mu mbanyin
column6: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn ananakan do wɔ Levifo no mu no nyinara."

column2: "Na dɛm na Hezekia yɛe no wɔ Juda nyinara mu; na ɔyɛɛ dza oye na ɔtsen na ɔyɛ nokwar wɔ n’EWURADZE Nyankopɔn enyim."
